website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy wheel chock that won't move around on you and can hold up to a 1,500 lb.
pros: Designed for storage, transport, and maintenance
Made from high-grade, heavy-duty alloy steel
cons: Some reports of it arriving scratched or missing hardware
Locking mechanism is of poor quality

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2001 Heritage and 2017 Street Glide. Both bikes ride on and off this chalk with great ease. You can be on or off the bike and roll it on and off easily. It’s lightweight but does not move at all, even on my painted garage floor. Once your on it you can get off the bike and it holds it up without strapping it down. Me and the friends I ride with all have one.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Streak

customer_reviews.title: This is a keeper!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I use this as a stand in the garage and my trailer. Unlike other similar stands this one did not slide on the floor when moving my bike into the stand. In the trailer I use tie downs and I've hit bumps and even curbed the trailer on accident. When I checked the bike the stand did not move at all. I would definitely recommend this. Stay away from those crappy, heavy stands from harbor freight.
customer_reviews.author: bionicist

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Had to put the back legs on ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Had to put the back legs on a 3/4 inch board for easy put on and off. Very Sturdy. Use it all the time when in the garage. I have a Harley Sportster, so on the level it was hard to roll up on, with the board it was easier.
customer_reviews.author: sandpusher

customer_reviews.title: The laziest packaging I've ever seen!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely dissatisfied with my purchase! When my choke arrived, I found that all the hardware was everywhere, not packaged correctly, some hardware was missing and the choke assembly itself was scratched in several places. I am very disappointed in this company and this product. I will never again buy another thing from dragway!
customer_reviews.author: Josh Trenkle

customer_reviews.title: Dragway chalk
customer_reviews.text: As others have said very nice chalk but arrived with a few nasty scratches that shouldn’t happen in this day and age.If not for that would get 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Eglide

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great held my H-D up and it didn't move at all on recent trip
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made. Zero quality control.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived scratched and missing pieces. Seller was no help. Buy something else, you'll probably be better off.
customer_reviews.author: TopChef2015

customer_reviews.title: Good product but may need to modify it
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to set up, however when I drove my Harley street glide up on it it would not go all the way in due to the upper arm not going back far enough. It was close enough to use and I will modify it before I use it again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff C.

customer_reviews.title: Its not bad.
customer_reviews.text: The welds look bad but it does work and it does hold my Kawasaki ER6n upright. I was surprised that it did. The locking mechanism is incorrectly made and is completely useless.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Easy to assemble. No issues so far. Bike rest nice nicely on the stand!
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit my stock 04 Sportster 1200c but any taller front tire won't fit well otherwise does what it says
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: NOT for anything larger than 17"!
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality stand for 17" or smaller wheels. Anything bigger requires modifications to a fairly pricey stand that really isn't any better than others that are less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: MV

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble.use this on my 2014 hayabusa.works like a champ.
customer_reviews.author: lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Really, why show pictures made in USA. It ...
customer_reviews.text: Really, why show pictures made in USA. It is just more junk from China! No hardware for assembly! I hope Amazon drops you from their program!
customer_reviews.author: Shaffer's

customer_reviews.title: The product is good and does the job holding my Harley
customer_reviews.text: The product is good and does the job holding my Harley, however, it came scratched in the box a sign of low quality control as the shipping box was not damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Tomas Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: motorcycle wheel chock
customer_reviews.text: very happy with this; had purchased a new bike at distance from home this simplified getting it transported locked in was easier to tie down.this fit my suzuke marurder 800
customer_reviews.author: mainmom45

customer_reviews.title: Good basic stand for storing race bikes
customer_reviews.text: These are great as you can just ride up onto them instead of one handing the rear stand on spools. I use this mainly for storage. Main issue is my front tire tends to get stuck in the red part of the stand and it won't let go unless I stand over the front tire, with my feet placed on the legs of the stand and I lift the bike up and out. Then I can roll it backwards. Also, it didn't come with nuts for the 2 bolts so I had to make a quick run to the hardware store.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Tire size
customer_reviews.text: Worked fairly well. I have a 21" tire that is skinny, better suited for smaller diameter, fatter tires. but it serves the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Dragway Tools Motorcycle Wheel Chock Locking & Adjusting Stand 16" - 21" Tire
product_meta.description:
Dragway Tools Motorcycle Wheel Chock Locking & Adjusting Stand 16" - 21" Tire

Dragway Tools motorcycle wheel chock is ideal for trailering your motorcycle, performing maintenance and motorcycle storage. It can be used with a trailer or pick-up truck for safe transportation of your motorcycle or it can also be used in your garage or shop. Designed to fit a 120/70 - 17" front tire, will also work with 110mm or 16" tires found on some sports bikes, and also on larger bikes like a Harley-Davidson (21" tires). 4 nonslip rubber feet make this chock easy for a single person to load or unload the bike.

 * Designed for locking motorcycles upright for transporting, maintenance and storage
 * 1500LB Capacity
 * Will fit most 16" - 21" front wheels
 * Designed to fit a 120/70 - 17" front tire, will work with 110mm or 16" tires found on some sports bikes, and also on larger bikes like a Harley-Davidson (21" tires)
 * Self-wheel locking system
 * Heavy duty wheel chock is made of high-grade alloy steel
 * Single person operation for loading and unloading
 * Will lock and hold the front tire upright
 * Safety latch to prevent bike from backing out during transport
 * To remove pull back on bike and chock will automatically release the wheel
 * Upper shoe has 5 adjustment holes
 * Smaller location holds the bike tire and allows easy in and out action
 * Larger setting will allow a tire to engage farther into the stand for added stability while transporting
 * 4 nonslip rubber feet
feature_bullets: Designed for locking motorcycles upright for transporting, maintenance, & storage
1500LB Capacity - Will fit most 16" - 21" front wheels
Heavy duty wheel chock is made of high-grade alloy steel
Safety latch to prevent bike from backing out during transport

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars54 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
